eetada owhu niyama karanaladdoya. 9 numuth andhakarayen thamange wismapath aalokayata numbaala kandawagath thananwahansege uthkrushtathawan dakwana pinisa numbaala wanahi thoragath wanshayakda rajakiya pujakayoda shuddhawu jathiyakda dewiyanwahanse santhaka senangakda wannahuya. 10 warak numbaala senangakwa sitiye natha, numuth dan dewiyanwahansege senangawa sitinnahuya; dayawa nolaba sitiya numuth dan dayawa laba sitinnahuya. 11 premawanthayeni, numbaala aaganthukayanda wideshinda men, aathmayata wiruddhawa yuddhakarana mansika thrushnawalin walaki sitina lesa numbaalagen illami. 12 numbaala napurakarannoyayi anyajathin numbaalata wiruddhawa kathakarana numuth, owun numbaalage yahapath kriya daka, wibhagakirime dawasedi dewiyanwahanseta gaurawakarana pinisa, owun athare numbaalage hasirima obinalesa pawathwanna. 13 uththamayawa sitina rajuta wewa, napura karannanta danduwama pinisath yahapatha karannanta prashansawa pinisath raju wisin ewanaladdawu aandukarayanta wewa, 14 siyalu manushya niyogawalata swaminwahanse nisa yatathwenna. 15 maknisada mese numbaala yahapatha kirimen anuwana manushyayange agnyanakama nishshabdakirima dewiyanwahansege kamaththaya. 16 eseya, numbaala nidahas aya numuth, ee nidahasa napurata wasmak kota nowa dewiyanwahansege dasayan men wyawaharakaranna.

kese namuth noriko san wikasanaya kota aththe sarala charithayak lesini.aya aarambhaye sitama eethakariwa wikasanaya wanu dakagatha hakiya.ewani charitha elwud handunwanu labuwe sarala charithayan lesini samasthayak washayen agaya kala haki nawakathawaki.katha winyasaya wikasanaya kirima sandaha uththama purusha drushtikonaya yodaganima nawakathawen kiyawena athdakima patakayata wadath samipa wimata hethu wi atha.esema yodagath baswahara athishayin prabhalaya,nirmanashiliya,rasawathya.kawyathmaka basak upayuktha kotagena atha.eya nawakathawe sarthakathwayata behewin upakari wi atha.esema wides pasubimak matha godananganu labu brathama nawakathawa wanneda meyayi.eya nawakatha kshethrey nawum pimmak panimata samath wiya.esema dinapoth,athithawarjana wani upakrama dakathawa nikasanaya kirima sandaha ujayuktha kota ganima agaya kala yuthuya.esema mema nakathathawa saha rajya sammana pawa himiwimen mema nakathawe wishishata pawa pasak nowannehida?kese namudu nawakathawa magin pulul windanayak labimata nam mehi dewana kotasa wana malawunge awurudu da nawakathawada kiyawiya yathuya.
